definitions: the breeding of specimens of a plant or animal by natural processes from the parent stock

examples.text: the propagation of plants by root cuttings

shortDefinitions: breeding of specimens of plant or animal by natural processes from parent stock

examples.text: hunting regulations ensure the propagation of the species
asexual propagation is the primary mode of reproduction

definitions: the action of widely spreading and promoting an idea, theory, etc.

examples.text: a life devoted to the propagation of the Catholic faith
the propagation of ideas was important

shortDefinitions: action of widely spreading and promoting idea, theory, etc.

definitions: transmission of motion, light, sound, etc. in a particular direction or through a medium

examples.text: the propagation of radio waves through space

shortDefinitions: transmission of motion, light, sound, etc. in particular direction or through medium
